title: 820-2915-a Turns on, no picture
message: Here we had the GPU replaced a few months ago, it was working perfectly since then, now there is no picture anymore, we have replaced the GPU again with the same results, turns on, boot sound but no picture. operation system boots and you can hear sounds from the OS, any idea how can a board go bad like this?

title: 820-2915-a Turns on, no picture
message: What date code GPU are you using? Damaged caps in PCIE lines C8020-70
